title: bagyKid
author: bagyKid
content: Wide range of Genuine Leather Bags, Leather Duffle Bags, Leather Bags, and Leather Wallets.We have been facing payment method issues for many years, like higher commission fees, Chargeback issues, and reserve balance matters.Now we are accepting the Bitcoin Payment Method for our online shopping website. Extremely easy for us and even for customers without any delays we get payment and deliver the product instantlyIf you want to buy Handcrafted Leather Bags and Leather Products,Visit our store. https://www.buybag.co.il

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: bagyKid on December 05, 2022, 10:06:49 PMWe have been facing payment method issues for many years, like higher commission fees, Chargeback issues, and reserve balance matters.Just checked your Whois details and it appears that the domain you're trying to promote was registered three months ago only [if you were referring to another domain, then you might want to list it]:Quote from: https://www.isoc.org.il/whoisDomain Name: buybag.co.ilAssigned: 09-07-2022Last update: 11-15-2022Validity Date: 09-07-2023Quote from: bagyKid on December 05, 2022, 10:06:49 PMNow we are accepting the Bitcoin Payment Method for our online shopping website. Extremely easy for us and even for customers without any delays we get payment and deliver the product instantlyYou have a point, but it seems that nothing could stop you from not scamming your customers [CMIIW]!
